unconditional.translation[0].definitions: not limited by or depending on any conditions
the unconditional release of all political prisoners
unconditional.translation[1].definitions: a takeover offer which does not depend on any conditions
The group announced that it made a formal unconditional bid to the board offering to buy 160,000 shares.
if a takeover offer goes or becomes unconditional, it is accepted by more than half the existing shareholders
Once the offer document is posted, a takeover offer can become unconditional within four weeks.
